events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position. The resume shows strong experience in full-stack development and cloud technologies.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to extensive background in software development and relevant skills in Java and AWS.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s hiring process and coordinate upcoming interview stages.
Conducted initial screening via video call. The candidate demonstrated solid understanding of system design principles and problem-solving skills.
Candidate replied promptly confirming availability for the technical interview next week and expressed enthusiasm for the role and company.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC with senior engineers to assess coding and architectural skills.
